cost.title: Reduced energy costs
cost.description: Reduce your fuel expenses by up to 80% compared to thermal vehicles. In Tunisia, electricity costs around 0.150 TND/kWh.

eco.description: Zero CO₂ emissions, contribute to cleaner air in Tunisia and reduce your carbon footprint.

about.title: About JMEV Tunisia
about.subtitle: Your trusted partner for electric mobility in Tunisia

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: JMEV Tunisia is the official distributor of JMEV electric vehicles in Tunisia. Founded in 2020, our mission is to make electric mobility accessible to all Tunisians.
story.p2: We firmly believe that the future of mobility is electric, and we are committed to offering quality vehicles, exceptional after-sales service and personalized support for each customer.
story.p3: In partnership with JMEV, we bring international expertise while remaining anchored in Tunisian reality, with solutions adapted to the local market.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide our daily actions

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We believe in technological innovation for sustainable mobility.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: Committed to a cleaner and more environmentally respectful future.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: Making electric mobility accessible to all Tunisians.

service.title: Service
service.description: Excellent customer service and personalized support.

timeline.title: Our Journey
timeline.subtitle: Key milestones in our development in Tunisia

partnership.title: Partnership with JMEV
partnership.description: As the official JMEV distributor in Tunisia, we have direct access to the latest innovations and technologies from the brand. This partnership allows us to offer you superior quality vehicles, international-level technical support, and complete warranties.

cta.title: Join the Electric Revolution
